message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it holds for both of us. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,350,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, $1,350,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to come down a little further to $1,375,000. This would be a good compromise for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
I understand your position, Alice. I've carefully considered our previous negotiations and am willing to offer $1,360,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will be acceptable to you.
